hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Small Waterfall in the amidst of Nature
hiveArticle.body:
We all love waterfalls which are big and flowing from a height, though we too have small waterfalls everywhere which might think to become a big one just like our dreams. Our dreams are to become big and better, but instead of only dreaming we also have to start working just like this water which is flowing irrespective of thinking that is it gonna become big or remain small.

![_DSC0028.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQEazWmcdjhx8CcVGKKXsjcuPbXsMdztVVg59cPrmk2N8/_DSC0028.jpg)

<hr>

![_DSC0029.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVsjoHErUBvwtUtbGRpqdRQQmRvQrH7P851BmokjwyGEN/_DSC0029.jpg)

Camera : Nikon 5200
